column1: Kata Robata////My friend got the ox tail ramen
column2: which when looking back is a mistake. It is filling
column3: but 19 dollars for ramen? When we got the bowl
column4: the first thing we thought was
column5: "Where is the ox tail?". Sure enough
column6: the ox tail was all shredded up and just put in the bowl. I believe that serving ox-tail off the bone is just a sin. You lose the experience of tasting the ligaments and the texture is just gone. The broth.... did taste good
column7: but you could seriously taste the hondashi (AKA Japanese MSG). Noodles were great as well
column8: had a good bite without being mushy.
